column1: 對話
Pray, doth thou have news of mine kin?
I’m so tired today.
What are you up to later?
Let’s grab lunch sometime.
I’ll call you in a bit.
It’s so cold today!
Do you want to hang out?
I need a break.
What time does the meeting start?
Prithee, do thee have a moment to spare?
Good morrow, mine friend.
Thou art truly a sight for sore eyes.
Verily, I have no coin to pay.
Wilt thou accompany me to the tavern?
How’s your day going?
Forsooth, I have not seen thee in ages.
Hark! The bell doth toll.
I’m so tired today.
I beseech thee, lend me thy ear.
Might I trouble thee for a word?
Can you help me with this?
